objects.title: Ceramic Vessel No. 3
objects.description: Hand-crafted ceramic vessel with subtle texture variations that catch and reflect light.
objects.longDescription: This hand-crafted ceramic vessel is the result of our material exploration into subtle texture variations. Each piece is unique, with slight variations in texture and finish that catch and reflect light in different ways throughout the day. The minimalist form allows the material qualities to take center stage.
details: Material: Stoneware clay with matte glaze
Care: Wipe clean with a damp cloth

objects.title: Paper Light Shade
objects.description: Handmade paper light shade with folded geometric pattern creating intricate shadow play.
